reviewText: Excellent DVD to help with personal study after reading the book

This DVD was perfect. It really does a wonderful job getting to the why's of not allowing ugly things into our spirit. We are fragile and complex at the same time. We should allow only good and positive thoughts in our minds. I am going to purchase many more of these for gifts. This DVD helps to learn how to practice protecting innocence.
I think this is a wonderful program to get the "weeds" out of our Christian souls to be better equipped to serve Jesus Christ.

Received in a timely manner.
Currently doing a 100 day consecration and incorporate this book along with another as well (by Dr Cindy Trimm) about soul cleansing and it is life changing.
hIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!
Great book and DVD for our Sunday school class

This DVD is so personalable that it makes it easy to follow.
I'm using this along with the book and participants guide to do this series.
would recommend to be used as bibleclass or small groups
Given as a gift to family but had heard the first part and was intrigued in simplifying our Christian relationships.  Arrived in great shape.
Great bible study!  I purchased the DVD to go along with the bible study.

This is a good study for people of all ages. The message is clear and delivered in such a manner that I felt related to me in one way and others related on a different level. Short, solid delivery. Worked well for group study as well as personal study.

We are using Soul Detox as a group study. The video that goes with it is interesting, but it would be possible to do a good study with just the book and study guide. Part of what has made it so relevant is that Craig talks about things that we all do or have done, and speak to us about the decisions we make every day. We recommend it!
Very confusing study. Chapters and DVD were hard to follow. Good topics.
Very good study! Our group loved it.
